mapper.insert: insert into notice(receiver, sender, type, bno) values(#{receiver}, #{sender}, #{type}, #{bno})
mapper.select: select id,reg,type,read,bno,nick,profile from (select * from notice inner join member on (notice.sender = member.id) ) where receiver=#{id} order by reg desc
mapper.delete: delete notice where receiver=#{receiver} and sender=#{sender} and type=4
